data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: The smallest of actions is always better than the noblest of intentions.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Greatness on the outside begins within.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: What makes a champion is not how elegantly you start, but how strongly you finish.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Be willing to do what’s hard now to enjoy what’s beautiful later.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Mistake is a mistake only if you make it twice.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Don’t live the same year 75 times and call it a life.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Be the CEO of your life.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Run your own race. Who cares what others are doing? The only question that matters is, Am I progressing?

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Stop being a prisoner of your past. Become the architect of your future.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: To be successful in business and life, spot the possibilities while others look for problems.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: There is great power in starting.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: If you don’t act on life, life will act on you.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Give out what you most want to come back.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Have the discipline to clean out all the energy-draining people in your life.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: You were born into fearlessness, but the world may have taught you to fear.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Speak your truth even if your voice shakes.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Care a lot more about how many people you help than how much recognition you receive.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Misunderstood is the price ambition pays to become legendary.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: This day is your life in miniature. Make it brilliant.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Everything is created twice, first in the mind and then in reality.
